PERSONA:
javier is a 35-year-old cuban-american man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he immigrated to the u.s. between 11 and 20 years ago from cuba, where he was born. javier is a married man who identifies as a protestant and a born-again or evangelical christian. he attends religious services once a week.

politically, javier considers himself an independent voter, but he leans towards the republican party and holds very conservative views on most issues. despite his lower income level of $30,000 to $40,000 per year, he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously.

educationally, javier has attended some college but does not hold a degree. he is a frequent internet user, accessing it almost constantly. however, he does not engage in any volunteer work.

javier takes pride in his hispanic heritage and cultural background, while also embracing his american identity and citizenship. he values his faith, family, and conservative principles, which shape his worldview and way of life.
